page.title: 03Life in Wall Wood, Harpenden
page.content: My name is{Claire Wardle. I live in the middle of a wood called {Wall Wood.}One lovely sight I have seen in my garden is{a big doe deer {with her baby fawn}strolling across on a summer's afternoon. Some of our garden is wood too.{In our garden we {have a swimming pool,}and{we have a {number of animals: 2 Dogs, 7 Chickens, {2 Goldfish, 1 Hamster, 1 Cockerel, and {1 Goose.}My dad managed to bring a {gosling}home from the farm because the {mother goose}was treading all over her {young}and might have killed them. I looked after it,{and now we have a {fully grown Gander}who is very{fierce. He guards the house and will attack strangers.{He can't fly because his {wings were injured}and they stick out. I enjoy living in Wall Wood.
